General.Name: Currie Rose Resources Inc
General.Description: Currie Rose Resources Inc., an exploration stage company, explores for precious and battery metal properties. It focuses on advanced Vanadium project in Queensland, Australia. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
